charts.metaDescription: Near 提供一套实时 Near 数据图表和统计信息来跟踪 NearBlocks 的所有内容：Price、Supply、Marketcap、Transaction Fee 等。
charts.heading: Near Charts & Statistics
charts.otherHeading: 其他 Near Blockchain Charts & Statistics

nearPrice.metaTitle: Near Price 今日：信息、Chart、Stats | NearBlocks
nearPrice.metaDescription: Near Daily Price (USD) chart 显示 Near 的美元日历史价格。所有数据都是实时、准确的，直接从 Near blockchain 获取。
nearPrice.heading: Near Daily Price (USD) Chart
nearPrice.description: Near Daily Price (USD) chart 显示 Near 的美元日历史价格。

marketCapCharts.metaDescription: Near Market Capitalization chart 显示 Near 每日市值和价格的历史分解。所有数据都是实时、准确的，直接从 Near blockchain 获取。
marketCapCharts.heading: Near Market Capitalization Chart
marketCapCharts.description: Near Market Capitalization chart 显示 Near 每日市值和价格的历史分解。

nearSupplyCharts.metaTitle: Near Supply Chart：Circulating, Total Supply | NearBlocks
nearSupplyCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain Supply Growth Chart 显示每日区块奖励和总 Near supply 的分解。所有数据都是实时、准确的，直接从 Near blockchain 获取。
nearSupplyCharts.heading: Near Supply Growth Chart
nearSupplyCharts.description: Near Supply Growth Chart 显示每日和总 Near supply 的分解。

txnsCharts.metaDescription: Near transactions chart 突出显示 Near blockchain blockchain 上的 transactions 总数，每日个人分解为 total transaction、total blocks 和 total new account seen。
txnsCharts.heading: Near Daily Transactions Chart
txnsCharts.description: Chart 突出显示 Near blockchain 上的 transactions 总数，每日个人分解为 total blocks 和 total new account seen。

blocksCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain Block Count Chart 显示在 Near blockchain 上每日产生的 blocks 历史数量。所有数据都是实时、准确的，直接从 Near blockchain 获取。
blocksCharts.heading: Near Block Count
blocksCharts.description: Near Block Count Chart 显示在 Near blockchain 上每日产生的 blocks 历史数量。

addressesCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain unique accounts chart 显示 Near blockchain 上不同 accounts 的总数和每日 account 数量的增长。
addressesCharts.heading: Near Unique Accounts Chart
addressesCharts.description: Chart 显示 Near blockchain 上不同 accounts 的总数和每日 account 数量的增长。

txnFeeCharts.metaTitle: Near Transaction Fee History：Transaction Fee | NearBlocks
txnFeeCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain transaction fee chart 显示在 Near blockchain (Ⓝ) 上每个 transaction 花费的美元日金额。所有数据都是实时、准确的，直接从 Near blockchain 获取。
txnFeeCharts.heading: Transaction Fee Chart
txnFeeCharts.description: Chart 显示在 Near blockchain 上每个 transaction 花费的美元日金额。

txnVolumeCharts.metaTitle: Near Transaction Volume Chart：Transaction Volume | NearBlocks
txnVolumeCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain transaction volume chart 显示在 Near blockchain 上每个 transaction 花费的美元日金额。
txnVolumeCharts.heading: Transaction Volume Chart
txnVolumeCharts.description: Chart 显示在 Near blockchain 上每个 transaction 花费的美元日金额。

multichainTxns.metaDescription: Multichain Transactions chart 突出显示 Near blockchain 上 multi chain transactions 的总数。
multichainTxns.heading: Multichain Transactions Chart
multichainTxns.description: Chart 突出显示 Near blockchain 上 multichain transactions 的总数。
